text: Nodolatirus robillardi is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Fasciolariidae, the spindle snails, the tulip snails and their allies.MolluscaBase eds. (2020). MolluscaBase. Nodolatirus robillardi (Tapparone Canefri, 1879). Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species at: http://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=732682 on 2020-06-11 ==Description== ==Distribution== ==References== * Bouchet P. & Snyder M.A. (2013) New and old species of Benimakia (Neogastropoda: Fasciolariidae) and a description of Nodolatirus, new genus. Journal of Conchology 41(3): 331-341. ==External links== * Category:Fasciolariidae Category:Gastropods described in 1879
title: Nodolatirus robillardi
